message: This is a great opportunity to buy a product at a discounted price of $100. If you buy it, you can try it out and see what you think. If you don't like it, you can always use it as a coaster or a paperweight. It's a risk-free purchase!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount and the risk-free nature of the purchase. I'll take the chance and buy the product.
